tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE endangered_species (
    species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_name VARCHAR(255),
    population_count INT,
    conservation_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE PopulationTrends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INT,
    year INT,
    population_estimate INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_species_id FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES EndangeredSpecies(species_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Habitat (
    habitat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INT,
    habitat_type VARCHAR(100),
    habitat_area FLOAT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_species_id FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES EndangeredSpecies(species_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ConservationActions (
    action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    species_id INT,
    action_description TEXT,
    action_date DATE,
    CONSTRAINT fk_species_id FOREIGN KEY (species_id) REFERENCES EndangeredSpecies(species_id)
);
